movie.title: Bruce Bruce: Losin' It
movie.description_intro: Larger than life comic Bruce Bruce is back with his new stand-up comedy special. The hilarious comic delivers non-stop laughter as he puts his own unique spin on topics ranging from family, dating younger women and going to church. Filmed in Boston, MA in front of a live audience at the historic Wilbur Theatre, Bruce Bruce brings down the house with his true to life humor and raw comedic wit.
movie.description_full: Larger than life comic Bruce Bruce is back with his new stand-up comedy special. The hilarious comic delivers non-stop laughter as he puts his own unique spin on topics ranging from family, dating younger women and going to church. Filmed in Boston, MA in front of a live audience at the historic Wilbur Theatre, Bruce Bruce brings down the house with his true to life humor and raw comedic wit.

movies.title: SexSquatch
movies.summary: A group of friends having a "deflowering" party for their friend are being stalked by a horny Sexsquatch named Stink Fist and his sidekick that smells of marmalade.
movies.description_full: A group of friends having a "deflowering" party for their friend are being stalked by a horny Sexsquatch named Stink Fist and his sidekick that smells of marmalade.
movies.synopsis: A group of friends having a "deflowering" party for their friend are being stalked by a horny Sexsquatch named Stink Fist and his sidekick that smells of marmalade.

movies.title: Feast III: The Happy Finish
movies.summary: The survivors are saved by the mysterious prophet, Short Bus Gus, who seemingly has the ability to control the beasts. He leads them into the sewers as they travel to the big city. Along the way they get help from karate expert Jean-Claude Seagal and learn that the beasts originate from a place called "The Hive." Armed with this knowledge, they decide to fight back and destroy the beasts once and for all.

movies.title: Something to Talk About
movies.summary: Grace Bichon, who is managing her father Wyly King's riding-stable, discovers that her husband, Eddie, deceives her with another woman. After confronting him in the middle of the night on the streets of their small home town, she decides to stay at her sister Emma Rae's house for a while to make up her mind. Breaking out of her everyday life, she starts to question everyone's authority, especially Wyly's, thus causing a stir in her parents' marriage, too.

movies.title: Gintama 2: Rules are Made to be Broken
movies.title_english: Gintama 2: Rules are Made to be Broken
movies.title_long: Gintama 2: Rules are Made to be Broken (2018)
movies.summary: The Yorozuya gang returns to protect the country's shogun when the Shinsengumi police force finds itself in a crisis.
